summary.span: 提供实用工具方法来撰写和分析 pack URI 对象。

span.span: Provides utility methods to compose and parse pack URI objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ComparePackUri (Uri firstPackUri, Uri secondPackUri);
.method public static hidebysig int32 ComparePackUri(class System.Uri firstPackUri, class System.Uri secondPackUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function ComparePackUri (firstPackUri As Uri, secondPackUri As Uri) As Integer
public: static int ComparePackUri(Uri ^ firstPackUri, Uri ^ secondPackUri);
static member ComparePackUri : Uri * Uri -> int

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示两个包 URI 是否等效。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two pack URIs are equivalent.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示 和 之间的关系。

span.span: A signed integer indicating the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `firstPackUri` 和 `secondPackUri` 均为 `null` ，则 返回0。If both `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are `null`, returns 0. 比较包 Uri 时，空 URI 始终小于非空 URI。When comparing pack URIs, a null URI is always less than a non-null URI. 对于 `firstPackUri` 和 `secondPackUri` 都是绝对包 uri 的情况， 将执行比较。For cases where `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are both absolute pack URIs, performs the comparison.

span.span: Either or is not an absolute URI.
Either or do not begin with a "pack://" scheme.

Public Shared Function ComparePartUri (firstPartUri As Uri, secondPartUri As Uri) As Integer
public: static int ComparePartUri(Uri ^ firstPartUri, Uri ^ secondPartUri);
static member ComparePartUri : Uri * Uri -> int

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示两个包部件 URI 是否相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two package part URIs are equivalent.

returns.span: 一个值，指示 和 之间的关系。

span.span: A value that indicates the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `firstPartUri` 和 `secondPartUri` 均为 `null` ，则 返回0。If both `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are `null`, returns 0. 比较 uri 时，空 uri 始终小于非空 uri。When comparing URIs, a null URI is always less than a non-null URI. 对于 `firstPartUri` 和 `secondPartUri` 都是相对 uri 的情况 ，将 执行比较。For cases where `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are both relative URIs, performs the comparison.

exception.span: 或 不是有效的部件 URI 语法。

span.span: or is not a valid part URI syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表说明了方法的示例事例 。The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|返回的 pack URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/page2pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/a/page4pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/%41/% 61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/% 25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack：//http：、、proseware、mypackage .pkg/% 25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/page5pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |`http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04`|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack：//http：，，，proseware，包 .aspx %3 f pkg04/page1. xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack：//http：、、proseware、mypackage。 .pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |`ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc`|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack：//ftp：，，，proseware，包，mypackage1/mydocpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |`file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg`|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file：,,, d：、包、mypackage2. .pkg/a/bar。 xaml # xpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| 编写包 URI 是一个多步骤过程。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，形成包 URI 的一个步骤是将带逗号的正斜杠 (/) 字符替换 `packageUri` (，) 。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 有关字符串转换和如何构造 pack Uri 的详细信息，请参阅 "开放打包约定规范" 中的附录 A 4 "字符串转换示例 [" 和附录](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)b. 3 "编写包 URI"。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

summary.span: 创建一个指向包的新包 URI。

span.span: Creates a new pack URI that points to a package.

returns.span: 由给定的 引用的 的包 URI。

span.span: The pack URI for the referenced by the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` 不得指定为 `null` 或空。`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. 下表说明了的示例事例 。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packageUri`|返回的 pack URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|-----------------------| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|pack：//http：、、proseware、mypackage。 .pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|pack：//ftp：，，，proseware，包，mypackage1pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|pack://file：,,, d：，包，mypackage2. .pkgpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| 编写包 URI 是一个多步骤过程。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，形成包 URI 的一个步骤是将带逗号的正斜杠 (/) 字符替换 `packageUri` (，) 。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 有关字符串转换和如何构造 pack Uri 的详细信息，请参阅 "开放打包约定规范" 中的附录 A 4 "字符串转换示例 [" 和附录](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)b. 3 "编写包 URI"。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法定义引用包的包 URI。The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

span.span: The URI of the in the package.

summary.span: 在给定 URI 和包中部件的 URI 的情况下创建包 URI。

span.span: Creates a pack URI given a URI and the URI of a part in the package.
The pack URI of the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` 不得指定为 null 或为空。`packageUri` may not be specified as null or empty. 如果 `partUri` 为 `null` ，则返回的 pack URI 指向包。If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. 下表说明了方法的示例事例 。The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|返回的 pack URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/page2pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/a/page4pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/%41/% 61.xml/%41/%61.xml|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/% 25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|pack：//http：、、proseware、mypackage .pkg/% 25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|**null****null**|pack：//http：、、proseware、mypackage。 .pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|pack：//ftp：，，，proseware，包，mypackage1/mydocpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|pack://file：,,, d：、包、mypackage2. .pkg/a/bar。 xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| 编写包 URI 是一个多步骤过程。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，形成包 URI 的一个步骤是将带逗号的正斜杠 (/) 字符替换 `packageUri` (，) 。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 有关字符串转换和如何构造 pack Uri 的详细信息，请参阅 "开放打包约定规范" 中的附录 A 4 "字符串转换示例 [" 和附录](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)b. 3 "编写包 URI"。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法定义引用包的包 URI。The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri Create(class System.Uri packageUri, class System.Uri partUri, string fragment) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (packageUri As Uri, partUri As Uri, fragment As String) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ Create(Uri ^ packageUri, Uri ^ partUri, System::String ^ fragment);
static member Create : Uri * Uri * string -> Uri
public static Uri Create (Uri packageUri, Uri? partUri, string? fragment);

span.span: The URI of the in the package.

param.name: fragment
param.span: 标识包部件中的元素的“#”引用。

span.span: A "#" reference identifying an element within the package part.

summary.span: 在给定 URI、包中部件的 URI 以及要追加的“#”片段的情况下创建包 URI。

span.span: Creates a pack URI given a URI, the URI of a part in the package, and a "#" fragment to append.

returns.span: 标识指定包、包部件和片段的包 URI。

span.span: The pack URI that identifies the specified package, package part, and fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` 不得指定为 `null` 或空。`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. 如果 `partUri` 为 `null` ，则返回的 pack URI 指向包。If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. `fragment` 不能为空字符串，但可以指定为 `null` 。`fragment` cannot be an empty string but can be specified as `null`. 当未指定为时 `null` ， `fragment` 字符串必须以 "#" 字符开头。When not specified as `null`, the `fragment` string must begin with a '#' character. 有关引用语法的详细信息 `fragment` ，请参阅 [RFC 3986](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt)的 "片段" 3.5 一节。For more information of the syntax of `fragment` references, see Section 3.5 "Fragment" of [RFC 3986](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt). 下表说明了方法的示例事例 。The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|返回的 pack URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/page2pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/a/page4pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/%41/% 61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/% 25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack：//http：、、proseware、mypackage .pkg/% 25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack：//http：，，，proseware，mypackage，.pkg/page5pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |`http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04`|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack：//http：，，，proseware，包 .aspx %3 f pkg04/page1. xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |`http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg`|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack：//http：、、proseware、mypackage。 .pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |`ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc`|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack：//ftp：，，，proseware，包，mypackage1/mydocpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |`file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg`|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file：,,, d：、包、mypackage2. .pkg/a/bar。 xaml # xpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| 编写包 URI 是一个多步骤过程。Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 例如，形成包 URI 的一个步骤是将带逗号的正斜杠 (/) 字符替换 `packageUri` (，) 。For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 有关字符串转换和如何构造 pack Uri 的详细信息，请参阅 "开放打包约定规范" 中的附录 A 4 "字符串转换示例 [" 和附录](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)b. 3 "编写包 URI"。For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法定义引用包的包 URI。The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri CreatePartUri (Uri partUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri CreatePartUri(class System.Uri partUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreatePartUri (partUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ CreatePartUri(Uri ^ partUri);
static member CreatePartUri : Uri -> Uri

span.span: The URI of the within the package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 始终从根引用的 URI 。The URI of a is always referenced from the root. 返回的 URI 是绝对路径，该路径始终以 "/" 开头并且符合 [开放式打包约定规范](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)中定义的语法。The returned URI is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 下表说明了的示例事例 。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`partUri`|返回的部件 URIReturned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |picture1.jpgpicture1.jpg|/picture1.jpg/picture1.jpg| |/picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg|/picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg| |a/mydoca/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml|/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法定义元素的相对 uri 。The following example shows how to use the method to define relative URIs for elements. [!code-csharp[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/CSharp/PackageWrite.cs#packagewritecreateparturi)] [!code-vb[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/visualbasic/packagewrite.vb#packagewritecreateparturi)]

public static Uri? GetPartUri (Uri packUri);

param.name: packUri
param.span: 从中返回 URI 的包 URI。

span.span: The pack URI from which to return the URI.

summary.span: 返回指定包 URI 内的 的 URI。

span.span: Returns the URI of a within a specified pack URI.

returns.span: 给定 中 的 URI，如果 指向包而不是 ，则为 。

span.span: The URI of the in the given , or if points to a package instead of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的 URI 相对于包根，是始终以 "/" 开头并且符合 [开放打包约定规范](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)中定义的语法的绝对路径。The returned URI is relative to the package root and is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 下表说明了的示例事例 。The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packUri`|返回的部件 URIReturned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |pack：//http：、、proseware、mypackage/a/mydocpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |pack：//http：，，，proseware，包 .aspx %3 f mypackage/a/bar。 xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml| |pack：//http：、、proseware、mypackage。 .pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|nullnull| |pack：//ftp：，，，proseware，包，mypackage1/a/picture.jpgpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg/a/picture.jpg| |pack://file：,,, d：、包、mypackage2. .pkg/a/bar。 xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|

span.span: If the is not an absolute .

exception.span: 从 中提取的 partUri 不符合有效 partUri 语法。

span.span: The partUri extracted from does not conform to the valid partUri syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必须标识 ( "/" ) 或 不是 部分。`partUri` must identify either the ("/") or a that is not a part. 有关部件的详细信息 ，请参阅 "开放打包约定规范" 中的 "关系" 一9.3 节 "关系"，可用于下载 [规范和许可证下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about parts, see Section 9.3 "Relationships" in the Open Packaging Conventions Specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples [WPF 中的 Pack URIPack URIs in WPF](/dotnet/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf) [开放式打包约定规范Open Packaging Conventions Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关系部件的属性必须标识 ( "/" ) 或 不是的 。The property of a relationship part must identify either the ("/") or a that is not a . 例如，如果包部分 "/files/document.xaml" 是关系部分 "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" 的源所有者，则调用 " `relationshipPartUri` /files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" 的参数将返回 "/files/document.xaml" 的。For example, if the package part "/files/document.xaml" is the source owner of the relationship part "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", calling with the `relationshipPartUri` parameter of "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" returns the of "/files/document.xaml".

does not reference a relationship part.
